Lelantus is coming

Sed quis nulla ac ante auctor vulputate nec a justo. In sed tristique nunc. Etiam sagittis erat in nibh auctor, sed tristique purus tristique. Fusce fermentum posuere urna sed sagittis. Curabitur fermentum ullamcorper sapien.

October 11, 2020

Diego

Overview

Zcoin Core Changelog

Sigma privacy transactions have been successfully reactivated at block 296900 as planned. Sigma transactions had been temporarily disabled as the Zcoin team patched a critical bug. The bug has no relation to our Sigma privacy technology but was disabled as a safety precaution.

If you haven’t done so already, please ensure you are upgraded to v0.14.0.5 . This is a mandatory release for users, exchanges, pools, miners and Znodes.

If you find yourself unable to sync to the latest block, you may need a reindex. Please follow the instructions here

Don’t forget to not accept any private messages offering help as none of our team will initiate a message first!

We thank you for your understanding and patience.
